Thêm

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PostService } from 'app/@core/services/api/post.service'; import { Observable, Observer } from 'rxjs'; export interface Iunit { id: string; name: string; address: string; description: string; created_at: string; updated_at: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-unit', templateUrl: './unit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./unit.component.scss'] }) export class UnitComponent implements OnInit { listUnit: Iunit[] = []; post: Iunit; constructor(private unit: PostService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getUnit(); } getUnit() { this.unit.getAllUnit().subscribe(res => { console.log(res); this.listUnit = res.data; }, error => { console.error(error); }); } addUnit(){ this.unit.storePost(this.listUnit); } onDelete(id:number){ this.unit.delete(id).subscribe(p=>{ console.log(p); this.unit.getAllUnit(); }) } }
